text: “To be clear, I think the media is trying to play games with the terminology of this virus when the focus should be on the fact that China let this out of their country,” McEnany shot back when asked if the White House considered the term “Kung Flu” racist https://t.co/WIoxKFu6Dm

text: “Rayshard was not a member of our church but he, and his loved ones, are a part of our family. We seek to embrace them, comfort them, and walk beside them in the days ahead.” https://t.co/5mV15rhj17

text: Seattle police will retake the East Precinct building within the boundaries of the Capitol Hill Organized Protest zone “peacefully and in the near future,” Mayor Jenny Durkan announced https://t.co/mZrCvxiARJ

text: Salons and barber shops have reopened in New York City. The new safety measures can lead to lots of sweat, but stylists also look forward to business—and “shit-talk”—as normal. https://t.co/QbrVxkavE5

name: thedailybeast
text: President Trump's Twitter rant about mail-in voting omitted the fact that virtually everyone eligible to vote in his immediate family has sent their vote via the postal service https://t.co/RkncAELPrP

text: Police clash with protesters near the White House, spraying a “chemical irritant” to break up a crowd that tried to topple a bronze statue of Andrew Jackson https://t.co/N2xpCA9SSW
